com.bham.bd.view.tools

Class GameFlowEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • javafx.event.Event
        • com.bham.bd.view.tools.GameFlowEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class GameFlowEvent
extends Event

    Events for game flow

    Represents event that is fired when a new instance of GameSession is created or when the user wants to pause or leave the game session.

    Note: this is a compact class for the whole game flow therefore different values are used by different event types. For example, PAUSE_GAME could set properties like numPlayers but they would not be used by the current design of our pause menu.

    See Also:
